title: $:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button
name: Button
author: dyp
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/CSS":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/CSS","caption":"CSS注释","condition":"[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] +[first[]]","created":"20240313040827751","description":"添加一个CSS注释","modified":"20250428180307724","shortcuts":"((CSS))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 代码注释","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="font-size: 0.6em;">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{[[/* ]] }}}
	suffix={{{[[ */]] }}}
/>
<$text text="/*  */"/>
</$button>"},"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/HTML":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/HTML","caption":"HTML注释","condition":"[<targetTiddler>type[]] [<targetTiddler>get[type]prefix[text/]] +[first[]]","created":"20240313041604280","description":"添加一个HTML注释","modified":"20250428180307728","shortcuts":"((HTML))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 代码注释","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="font-size: 0.6em;">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{[[<!-- ]] }}}
	suffix={{{[[ -->]] }}}
/>
<$text text="<!--  -->"/>
</$button>"},"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/code-comment-button/readme","created":"20250428175617478","modified":"20250428180307729","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"两个快捷输入代码注释符号的小按钮"}}}
